name: Cacao Nibs
benefits: Cacao nibs are one of the most antioxidant-rich foods available. They provide pure chocolate benefits without any added sugar or processing. Rich in flavonoids that support heart health, reduce inflammation, and may aid in weight management. Adds satisfying crunch and chocolate flavor to dishes.

quotes: cacao nibs - listed as breakfast topping option
Top with the cacao nibs and nuts (if using).
